text: Yastai nabujhne manisaharu bhandachan ki allaha hamisamga vartalapa, kina gardaina athava hamro lagi kunai cino kina a'umdaina? Yastai yasa prakarako kura unibhanda aghikale pani gareka thi'e. Uniharuka ra yiniharuka hrdayaharu eka jasta bha'isake ra hamile ta asthavanaharuka lagi cinoko varnana garisakeka chaum
